Notable changes

Known issues

  • Regression since 42.3.2: "cursor does not exist" when using ResultSet.setFetchSize from CallableStatement, fixed in 42.3.6 (see PG #2377)

Changed

  • fix: Removed loggerFile and loggerLevel configuration. While the properties still exist. They can no longer be used to configure the driver logging. Instead use java.util.logging configuration mechanisms such as logging.properties.

Added

Fixed

Commits by author

Dave Cramer (5):

  • add: security policy link to index PR 2440
  • Update: SECURITY.md PR 2445
  • fix: javadocs PR 2454
